name: Sort Out
description:
Sort Out is a puzzle game where you sort objects into groups.
Requires a mouse (no touch screen, yet).

Created for Trijam#150  themed "Grouping".

Assets used:

Font "Brittania"
By: atharuah-studios
https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/atharuah-studios/brittania/

Font "Great Vibes"
By: TypeSETit, LLC (typesetit@att.net)
https://www.1001freefonts.com/great-vibes.font

Music " Heart Science"
By: Ketsa
https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Ketsa/through-to-fall/heart-science-no-beats

SFX "jingle-win-synth-03.wav"
By: littlerobotsoundfactory
https://freesound.org/people/LittleRobotSoundFactory/sounds/274177/
